title: Convicts
occurrences: Asa, why aren't those convicts out in the field working?
One of them convicts killed another one and run off.
I thought maybe he gave the convicts the day off because of Christmas Eve.
I don't know what his name is. I don't be studying them convicts.
and the Overseer and the guards and you and me and the convicts.
Mr. Soll brought in the convicts to work the place.
Good morning, convicts.
Someday all of them convicts gonna get loose and we're gonna all be killed.
Right next to the other convicts' graves.
Mr. Soll say any convicts that die gets buried out here.
Did Overseer get them convicts back out in the field like I told him to?
I told him not to go over where them convicts live.
and the guards and the convicts.
and Martha, the convicts and the guards...
Damn convicts. They steal everything.
No, sir. That's the convicts' grave. That's not your graveyard.
Convicts. I'm gonna kill all of them convicts.
First he said he was shooting at bears, and then convicts.
There ain't any bears or convicts.
Damn convicts take all them tombstones off the graves.
You scared the convicts will get loose one night?
"Give me half and you take half," he said. "My wife is against working convicts."
Next thing I heard, he had his own convicts.
Convicts. There's three of them that have escaped.
- There's no damn convicts loose. - And you're a goddamn liar.
The convicts are all around.
No damn convicts will get near us, right?
- Convicts all quiet? - Yes, sir. Been quiet.
Before daybreak, go down there and tell the Overseer I want them convicts...
I want you to go out there now and get the convicts to make my coffin for me.
The rest are convicts.
No, Ben and Martha aren't convicts.
I had a dream that the convicts got loose and they came over here...
I was sitting here and Jackson came in with all them convicts.
Then all the convicts grabbed clubs and began to beat me.
How many convicts we have out here?
It was my daddy's idea to get convicts.
"Get rid of the tenants and hire yourself convicts."
I think one of them convicts got loose...
He got so mad at them convicts he had a stroke.
Ben and Jackson. All the damn convicts. I might outlive them all.
I want all of them goddamn convicts searched.
I'd rather have convicts near me than that stinking bunch.
If the convicts didn't keep it weeded over there...
and take the convicts over to her daddy's place.
Not my people. Not the convicts. Not Mr. Soll.
